xal.extension.solver.market

Class AlgorithmStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.extension.solver.market.AlgorithmStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AlgorithmPoolListener, AlgorithmScheduleListener, SolutionJudgeListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RandomAlgorithmStrategy, SingleAlgorithmStrategy

    public abstract class AlgorithmStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements AlgorithmScheduleListener, AlgorithmPoolListener, SolutionJudgeListener
    AlgorithmStrategy keeps track of algorithm strategies.

      measure of this strategy's running efficiency in solving the problem

        protected static int getNearestIntegerInRange(int target,
                                              int lower,
                                              int upper)
        Get the nearest integer to the specified target that is within the specified range.
        Parameters:
        target - the target that we are trying to meet
        lower - the minimum value of the allowed range
        upper - the maximum value of the allowed range
        Returns:
        the nearest integer to the target, but within the specified range

      • getRunCount

        protected static int getRunCount(int targetCount,
                                 SearchAlgorithm algorithm)
        Get the number of runs that is nearest the target count but withing the algorithm's accepted range.
        Parameters:
        targetCount - the target that we are trying to meet
        algorithm - the algorithm that specifies the valid range
        Returns:
        the suggested run count that is nearest the target count but within the specified algorithm's valid range
